TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A computer program that uses personal and family medical history information to estimate a woman’s chance of developing breast cancer. Also called Gail risk model.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "modelo de Gail"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Programa de computación que utiliza antecedentes personales y familiares para calcular la probabilidad de que una mujer enferme de cáncer de mama. También se llama modelo de riesgo de Gail.

RelatedInformation.RelatedExternalRef: The Breast Cancer Risk Assessment Tool
